Make a timeserie of dates

The fuction dateTimeSerie() builds the timeserie of date

dateTimeSerie(timeResolution, fromPeriod, toPeriod)

Arguments

timeResolution
choice between "daily","hourly","minute","second"
fromPeriod
"YYYYmmddHHMMSS"
toPeriod
"YYYYmmddHHMMSS"

Value

The output is a list of a timeserie of POSIXct and the number of steps

Examples

res <- dateTimeSerie("hourly","20150101","20150103")
head(res)
#> $nbStep
#> [1] 72
#> 
#> $seqPeriod
#>  [1] "2015-01-01 00:00:00 GMT" "2015-01-01 01:00:00 GMT"
#>  [3] "2015-01-01 02:00:00 GMT" "2015-01-01 03:00:00 GMT"

#> [11] "2015-01-01 10:00:00 GMT" "2015-01-01 11:00:00 GMT"
